message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $11,500 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider a lower price, perhaps around $10,000?

I understand that $10,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $11,000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,500? That's a fair compromise, don't you think?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal too. I can offer you a price of $11,250. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great compromise considering the value you'll get from the product.
